text: (misru cenra) avarkal tam tantai tankalukkuk kattalaiyitta pati nulaintatanal yahkuputaiya manatiliruntu oru nattattai avarkal niraiverri vaittarkale tavira, allahvitamiruntu (varakkutiya) etanaiyum atu avarkalai vittum tatukkakkutiyataka irukkavillai nam avarukku arivittuk kotuttavarril niccayamaka avar arivu(t tercci) perravaraka irukkinrar; eninum manitarkalil perumpalor itai ariyamattarkal
